I was going to return it, but changed my mind. I couldn’t resist wearing it because of the shade of green, which I really like. It’s green and a very dark navy. The color is beautiful with almost anything blue, or even with black, strangely enough. It’s well made, and the quality seems durable. It’s a tiny bit scratchy, depending what you wear underneath. It looks good over a dress or a shirt and pants. A fun piece for fall weather.

It's the late 90's. You've convinced your mom to take you to the mall. You're dressed in your best Britney Spears inspired outfit. Somewhere in the distance you can hear the sizzling of your boyfriend's hair as he frosts his tips for prom.  You walk in the mall. You're wearing this exact sweater-- but it's made of 100% acrylic yarn from Kmart-- you look amazing.  ----------------------- Re-live those glory days girl. Buy the adult version of the sweater. This one is a great value for the cost (it's wool, cashmere, and acrylic).  It's cute on, true to size, on trend, and has some heft to it. And unlike that boyfriend who took you to prom, it won't let you down.
